news:
New apps recirculation module is added.
 Update Benners and Cards to align buttons when text is too long.
Fix the background color of low empasis buttons.
Update ListItem to limite number of lines on title and subtitle.
Fix some accessibility issues like Small cards and Grid of small cards to avoid truncated text at accessibility level.

Update typography names.
 Update chips API and design.
Update CardHeaderFirst to get thumbnail from resources or url.
Refactor About module to manage errors when loading resources.
Fix some accessibility issues.

Add internationalization support.
 Add module List in demo application to illustrates header and footer of sections in list and update ListItem api to use SwiftUI elements.
Add accessibility statement in About module

Update the API of Cards and Banner components to use SwiftUI elements.
Update button emphasis to be aligned to the web design system.
Fix some bugs like the disable state of the IconButton.

Add about module (first version)
Update Application icons for Beta and Alpha versions
Update colors
Addition of the Bottom Sheet component.
Update application to publish on store as unsearchable application

1. Update Card component: 
- Update demo with realistics data
- Add SideBySide card
- Update Horizonal card to add a divider

2. Update assets for Innovation theme

Fix some bugs
 Add Tool bar component
